CustomField.formula:
OR( ispickval( CPE_DCS_Stage__c, ""),
AND( ispickval( CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Review Order"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Review Order") ),
AND( ispickval( CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Schedule CDC Call"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Review Order") ) )
CustomField.label: VTrans Lock
